      • notify

        public void notify(Context ctx,
                   NotificationIds notificationId,
                   int number,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Notifies to the status bar.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context
        notificationId - Notification type identification.
        number - A number of notifications of the same type.
        message - Message to show in the status bar.

      • notify

        public void notify(Context ctx,
                   NotificationIds notificationId,
                   int number,
                   java.lang.String message,
                   boolean onGoing)
        Notifies to the status bar.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context
        notificationId - Notification type identification.
        number - A number of notifications of the same type.
        message - Message to show in the status bar.
        onGoing - Indicates if the notification is non dismissible.
